title: Verify user is not able to add financial patron as a friend when changing the financial patron to attending patron and again changing the attending patron to financial patron

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. User should have 2 patrons which have same 
contact details and different account IDs
2. Launch PV link and login with valid credentials
3. navigate to ticket sales
4. select event and select the financial patron1
5. select the delivery method and change the 
financial patron1 to attending patron2
6. again change the attending patron2 to financial patron1
7. verify the financial patron is not added as a friend to the same financial patron.
8. complete the transaction
9. navigate to patron management and verify the same.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be met
2. user should be logged into appalication successfully
3. user should be navigated to ticket sales successfully
4. user should be able to select financial patron1 successfully
5. user should be able to select attending patron2 successfully
6. user should be able to change the attending patron2 to financial 
patron1 successfully
7. Expected:
Should get the following error in patron management when 
user try to add the same friend in the friends list:
* Patron Account and Friend Account cannot be the same 
account ID. Select a different account for friend
 
[pmiyagishima] the expected behavior is that PV should ignore 
the "add-friend" when the attending friend account is the 
same as the transaction patron;  similar to adding a duplicate 
friend association, no error should be thrown when dealing 
w/ attending patron in the cart.
8. user should be able to complete the transaction successfully
9. Expected:
Should get the following error in patron management when 
user try to add the same friend in the friends list:
* Patron Account and Friend Account cannot be the same 
account ID. Select a different account for friend
 
[pmiyagishima] the expected behavior is that PV should ignore 
the "add-friend" when the attending friend account is the 
same as the transaction patron;  similar to adding a duplicate 
friend association, no error should be thrown when dealing 
w/ attending patron in the cart.

title: Verify that no new account is created and the completed account is added to MyTickets receipient list if PV receipient accounts email id matches with any of the incomplete transfer receipient

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1.Login to PV
2. Create 2 Patron P1 and P2
3. 1.Login to MyTickets as P1
2.Select action as Transfer and select 
ticket
3.Add a incomplete transfer receipient with 
the same email id of P2 
4.Complete Transfer
4. Verify that the incomplete receipient is not 
added in the Friend list of the patron P1 in 
PV and no new account with the receipient 
address is created
5. Now make the receipient as Completed 
account
6. 1.Login to MyTickets as P1 
 
2.Verify that no new account is created (it 
should take the account id of P2) and P2 is 
added in the Recipient list
7. Verify that P2        is added in the Friends list ofpatron P1 in PV
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The user should be able to login to PV
2. Patron creation should be successful
3. Transfer should be completed
4. PVO should fetch the patron created in 
PV(P2) as the recipient.So no new account 
should be created and P2 should not be 
added in PV-Friends list of P1
5. Receipient should become a completed account
6. No new account should be created (it 
should take the account id of P2) and P2 
should be added in the friend list
7. P2 should not be added in the friends list of the patron P1 since the patron P2 is exists in PV

existing behavior of the application.

associations with request status â€œCANCELLEDâ€�, 
â€œDECLINEDâ€�, â€œREMOVEDâ€� or â€œREVOKEDâ€� will 
not be present in the response. These patron 
associations are logically deleted so, the existing 
application filters them out.
